ResearchProjectDef.label: monitoring throne
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to build the Monitor Throne, a high-tech control seat designed for anomaly suppression and psycasters. Sitting on the Monitor Throne enhances psyfocus gain by providing real-time data on anomalies.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->designed complex control systems for anomaly suppression
subject_story->collaborated with psycasters to enhance psyfocus efficiency

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasma weaponry development
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced plasma-based weaponry, including the plasma rifle and plasma caster. These powerful weapons are standard issue for high-ranking Syndicate soldiers like Exterminators.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->perfected plasma-based technology after decades of war with darkotech
subject_story->armed elite soldiers with plasma rifles capable of destroying heavily armored targets
subject_story->developed the plasma caster, a devastating heavy weapon used to clear enemy swarms
subject_story->wiped out an entire darkotech army with coordinated plasma strikes
